item.title: (PI) netty - stopping stress testers etc
item.dc:creator: @Agent_Jugz Agent Jugz
item.description:
@Agent_Jugz wrote:

i’ve implemented netty, but stress testers can login (allgofree blitz bot, runerebels stress tester etc). where as, in mina they can’t.

i was just wondering how i can stop them. i’ve tried something like:

[code] int uid = buffer.readInt();

		if(uid == 0 || uid == 99735086) {
			channel.close();
			return false;
		}[/code]

but it still doesn’t stop them. help is greatly appreciated, thanks.

Read full topic
